products.name: Onions
products.description: Premium-quality onions sourced from the fertile belts of Maharashtra. Known for freshness, flavor, and long shelf life. Varieties: Red Onion | Pink Onion | White Onion

products.name: Cocopeat
products.description: High-quality cocopeat blocks and powder for horticulture and hydroponics. 100% organic, renewable and eco-friendly.Sustainably processed from coconut husks — ideal for hydroponics, horticulture, and soil improvement. Varieties: 5 kg Blocks | 650 g Briquettes | Grow Bags | Loose Powder

products.name: Cow Dung
products.description: Pure, organic cow dung used as natural manure, perfect for sustainable and chemical-free farming.Eco-friendly and 100% natural — supporting organic farming and green living. Varieties: Dung Cakes | Manure | Logs | Powder

description: Authentic Indian spices that bring aroma, color, and taste to global cuisines. Sourced directly from trusted farms and processors.
